items.content_html: NextUIQ is a modern, lightweight UI component library built for rapid development. It is designed with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, offering prebuilt, customizable components that help developers build sleek and responsive user interfaces efficiently.
items.title: Mr-Bhardwa7/nextuiQ: NextUIQ is a modern, lightweight UI component library built for rapid development. It is designed with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, offering prebuilt, customizable components that help developers build sleek and responsive user interfaces efficiently.

items.title: dsogari/docml: Lightweight Document Markup Language

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.
items.title: jspreadsheet/openetl: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

items.content_html: A lightweight and modern TypeScript library for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on Google Sheets using the Google Sheets API. Built with ES6+ features and designed for Node.js environments.
items.title: rmay1er/gsheets-crud: A lightweight and modern TypeScript library for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on Google Sheets using the Google Sheets API. Built with ES6+ features and designed for Node.js environments.

items.title: matinsekhavat/kanaban-board: A lightweight Kanban board implementation to visualize workflow and track tasks through customizable columns.

items.content_html: PlayMyPodcast is a lightweight, serverless app that transforms your podcast RSS feed into a seamless, voice-controlled listening experience on Google Home. It fetches and parses your podcast feed, creating a playable playlist with support for standard media commands like play, pause, and skip.
items.title: JBerendes/PlayMyPodcast: PlayMyPodcast is a lightweight, serverless app that transforms your podcast RSS feed into a seamless, voice-controlled listening experience on Google Home. It fetches and parses your podcast feed, creating a playable playlist with support for standard media commands like play, pause, and skip.

items.content_html: The central hub for MicroStream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.
items.title: arijitcodes/microstream-hub: The central hub for MicroStream, a lightweight, real-time communication system for microservices. Routes messages between services, handles service discovery, and ensures seamless communication with WebSockets. Perfect for building scalable, event-driven architectures.

items.content_html: The client library for MicroStream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection. [ NPM üì¶ ]
items.title: arijitcodes/microstream-client: The client library for MicroStream, a lightweight, real-time communication library for microservices. Replace REST/gRPC with WebSockets for event-driven messaging. Simplifies inter-service communication with a request-response pattern and automatic reconnection. [ NPM üì¶ ]
